tool_description: Analyzes historical income data to assess income stability, growth trends, and predictability for underwriting risk assessment.

historical_income_data.description: Array of historical annual income amounts

income_years.description: Array of years corresponding to income data

employment_changes.description: Number of job changes in the period

income_source_type.description: Primary income source (salary, commission, business, mixed)

error_messages: Data array mismatch: Income data and years arrays must have same length
Insufficient data: Need at least 2 years of income history
Invalid year range: Years must be sequential and within reasonable range
Invalid industry type: Use one of [stable, cyclical, volatile, seasonal]
Invalid income source: Use one of [salary, commission, business, mixed]
usage: Provide historical_income_data and corresponding income_years arrays. Optionally specify employment_changes, industry_type, and income_source_type for enhanced analysis. Returns stability assessment and risk scoring.

income_trend.description: Income trend classification (increasing, stable, decreasing, volatile)

average_annual_growth.description: Average annual income growth rate as percentage

income_volatility.description: Coefficient of variation measuring income volatility
